question: Remove the transparency of the <img> element when the user hovers over it with the mouse pointer.
hint: Hint: Set the opacity property to 1.0.
correct_input: <head>    <style>    img {      opacity: 0.4;    }    img:hover {      opacity: 1.0;   }    </style>    </head>    <body>    <img src="/images/ex8.jpg" width="280" height="280">    </body>
